amendment.description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act to be used to provide financial assistance to Sanctuary Cities.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits funds within this act from being used in contravention of Federal immigration law for sanctuary city policies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 182 (Roll no. 382).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 182 (Roll no. 382).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Gosar.
